PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q "git commit"; then echo "CLAUDE.MD REMINDER: You just committed. Update relevant CLAUDE.md changelog with: what changed, errors found, lessons learned."; fi'

Stop.command: bash -c 'cd /home/user/Multi-Asset-Strategy 2>/dev/null && CHANGED=$(git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -v CLAUDE.md | head -5); if [ -n "$CHANGED" ]; then echo "SESSION END: Files modified this session. Ensure CLAUDE.md files record changes, errors, and fixes."; fi'
